translation: adj.仁慈的；宽大的
examples: (1) Be merciful to those who show mercy.(2) The merciful king saved the young officers from death.(3) She was merciful to the prisoners.(4) The brave are merciful; cowards do not dare to forgive their enemies.
(1) 对仁慈的人讲仁慈。(2) 仁慈的国王把年青的军官从死神手中救了出来。(3) 她对犯人很仁慈。(4) 勇敢者仁慈宽大，胆小鬼不敢饶恕敌人。

translation: n.仁慈；怜悯；恩惠；宽恕
examples: (1) Mercy to the enemies means cruelty to the people.(2) They showed their enemies no mercy.(3) They never appealed to us for mercy.(4) The commander showed mercy to the prisoners of war.(5) The prisoner implored the king for mercy.(6) The prisoner appealed to the judge for mercy.(7) The king showed no mercy and killed all the prisoners.
(1) 对敌人的仁慈就意味着对人民的残忍。(2) 他们不给敌人半点仁慈。(3) 他们从不向我们乞求怜悯。(4) 司令官对战俘十分怜悯。(5) 囚犯恳求国王开恩。(6) 囚犯恳求法官开恩。(7) 这个国王没有宽容之心，杀死了所有的犯人。

translation: adv.仅仅；只不过
examples: (1) They are not merely content to fill the stomach.(2) I accepted this job merely for the high salary.(3) She is merely a child.(4) I merely suggest you should do it again.
(1) 他们不仅仅满足于填饱肚子。(2) 我仅仅是因为高薪才接受了这份工作。(3) 她只不过是个孩子。(4) 我只是建议你重新做这件事。

translation: n.混乱；混杂；脏乱；一份食品；粪便；（军队的）食堂v.弄糟；弄乱；妨碍
examples: (1) The local economy is now in a mess.(2) The heavy rain made a great mess of the garden.(3) The room was in a terrible mess.(4) He caught a large mess of fish.(5) Who will clean up the cat's mess in the bedroom?(6) The party will be held in the officers' mess.(7) I am ask to organize the trip, but I mess it up.(8) You'd better not mess in the affairs of others.
(1) 当地的经济现在很混乱。(2) 这场大雨把花园搞得一团糟。(3) 房间里脏乱不堪。(4) 他捕到足够饱餐一顿的鱼。(5) 谁去清除卧室里的猫屎?(6) 聚会将在军官食堂举行。(7) 大家要我组织这次旅游, 可是我把事情搞糟了。(8) 你最好不要干涉他人的事情。

translation: adj.散乱的；污秽的；麻烦的
examples: (1) I can't find anything on this messy desk.(2) She doesn't know how to tidy up the messy room.(3) It is shaping up to be a dirty, messy campaign.(4) The divorce was painful and messy.(5) I'd like to know who wished off this messy job on me.
(1) 在这张堆放得乱七八糟的桌子上我什么也找不到。(2) 她不知道该怎样整理这个凌乱的房间。(3) 这绝对会成为一场卑鄙而肮脏的竞选。(4) 那次离婚令人痛苦而又纠葛不清。(5) 我想知道是谁把麻烦的活推给我做的。

translation: n.方法；条理n.类函数；类成员函数（计算机）
examples: (1) I have a simple and easy method.(2) New methods of teaching foreign languages are adopted in this institute.(3) His book is totally without method.(4) We must get some method into our office filing.
(1) 我有个简易的方法。(2) 该学院采用新的外语教学法。(3) 他写的那本书毫无条理。(4) 我们必须把公文归档工作弄出些条理来。

translation: n.墨西哥人；墨西哥语adj.墨西哥的
examples: (1) I read that the new director is a Mexican.(2) It was a great boost to Mexican morale and pride.(3) My mother can cook delicious Mexican food.(4) Mexican liquor made from fermented juices of an Agave plant.
(1) 我获悉新董事是墨西哥人。(2) 这对墨西哥人的士气和自尊来说是个巨大的鼓舞。(3) 我的母亲烧得一手墨西哥的美味佳肴。(4) 墨西哥的一种用已发酵的龙舌兰植物的汁液制成的酒。

translation: n.墨西哥
examples: (1) I learned Spanish during my residence in Mexico.(2) California and Mexico are contiguous.
(1) 我住在墨西哥时学会了西班牙语。(2) 加利福尼亚和墨西哥相邻。

translation: n.显微镜
examples: (1) He focuses the lens of a microscope.
(1) 他调整显微镜的透镜以定焦点。

translation: n.微波；微波炉vt.用微波炉加热
examples: (1) The samples were digested using a microwave oven.(2) A land line can be wire or fiber optics or microwave.(3) We cooked the fish in the microwave oven.(4) It also has a nice dish washer and microwave oven.(5) Last winter it unveiled a bra that can be heated in a microwave so as to help save on indoor heating costs.
(1) 用微波消解样品。(2) 陆上线路可以是金属或光纤电缆或者微波线路。(3) 我们在微波炉中煮鱼。(4) 一个洗碗机和一个微波炉。(5) 去年冬天，黛安芬公司为了响应日本政府的节能，就推出了一款可以用微波炉加热的文胸，从而减少室内供暖的成本。

translation: n.正午；中午
examples: (1) He's grilling out there in the midday sun.(2) We have finished work at midday.(3) We usually have a simple meal at midday.(4) It was good going to reach London by midday.
(1) 他在正午的阳光下受炙烤。(2) 我们已于正午完成任务。(3) 我们的中午饭一般都比较简单。(4) 那次行进速度很快，到中午已抵达伦敦。

translation: n.中东(一般泛指欧；亚；非三大洲连接的地区)=Mideast.
examples: (1) California law says that they must be taught from September to the middle of June.(2) Cartier's loyal high-end customers, particularly those living in China and the Middle East, have softened somewhat a consumer pullback elsewhere.
(1) 加里福尼亚州的法律规定儿童演员上课时间从九月到第二年的六月中旬。(2) 卡地亚的忠实高端客户，尤其是在中国和中东区域，冲淡了其他区域的客户下滑。

translation: aux.可能；也许；may的过去式n.威力；力量
examples: (1) That might be in your favor.(2) You might do me a favor?(3) If someone had been with him, he might not have been drowned.(4) The boy might have known the truth, but I am not quite sure.(5) We fear the military might of the enemy.(6) To be frank, this mission is beyond my might.(7) He fought back with all his might.
(1) 那可能对你有利。(2) 你或许能帮我—个忙吧?(3) 如果有人在他旁边，或许他就不会溺死。(4) 这男孩当时也许知道真相，但我不很确定。(5) 我们惧怕敌人强大的军事力量。(6) 说实话，这一使命非我能力所及。(7) 他倾全力反击。

translation: adj.温和的；柔和的；宽大的；清淡的
examples: (1) He has a mild nature.(2) He gave a mild answer, in spite of his anger.(3) The coastal area has very mild winter, but by contrast the central plains become extremely cold.(4) The patient has a mild fever.(5) The punishment inflicted on them was too mild.(6) This cheese is very mild.
(1) 他的性格温和。(2) 尽管他十分恼火,他还是态度温和地回答了。(3) 靠近海岸的地区有很温和的冬天,相比而方,靠近中央的平原就变得非常寒冷。(4) 那个病人有些轻微的发烧。(5) 他们受的惩罚太轻。(6) 这种奶酪味道清淡。

translation: n.英里；海里；一英里赛跑
examples: (1) My son hoofs a mile to school each day.(2) It's not less than a mile to the station.(3) He had come up from deep down in the water as the dark cloud of blood had settled and dispersed in the mile deep sea.(4) He wants to better his record for running the mile.
(1) 我的儿子每天步行一英里去上学。(2) 到火车站至少有一英里路。(3) 鱼深暗色的血在一哩深的海里，像云朵般地扩散开来，鲨鱼闻到血腥味便由深水中游过来。(4) 他要提高一英里赛跑的纪录。

translation: n.百万富翁
examples: (1) He spends as if he were a millionaire.(2) Now a millionaire, he typifies the self-made man.(3) He is not poor, on the contrary, he is a millionaire.(4) The library's latest acquisitions were donated by a millionaire.(5) They are all vultures round the bedside of the dying millionaire.(6) The millionaire has handed over 50 percent of his stock to his first son.(7) The lazy girl is dreaming of marrying a millionaire and therefore won't do any work.
(1) 他用起钱来像个百万富翁似的。(2) 他成了百万富翁，可以说是白手起家的典型。(3) 他不穷，相反，他是个百万富翁。(4) 图书馆最近增添的书籍是一位百万富翁捐献的。(5) 他们都是围拢在将要去世的百万富翁床边的贪心人。(6) 这个百万富翁已把他一半的股票移交给他的长子。(7) 这个懒惰的女孩正梦想着嫁给一个有钱人，从此不再工作。

translation: n.矿物(石）；矿物质
examples: (1) Coal is a mineral.(2) We are digging for mineral deposits.(3) They have sold up ten crates of mineral water in the afternoon.(4) Some people need to take vitamin and mineral supplements.
(1) 煤是一种矿物。(2) 我们正在掘地探矿。(3) 他们这个下午卖掉了十箱矿泉水。(4) 有些人需要补充维生素和矿物质补充剂。

translation: adj.最少的；最低程度的n.最低限度；最小量
examples: (1) That is the minimum number necessary to complete the circuit.(2) The minimum wage is 4.25 dollars an hour.(3) Repairing your car will cost a minimum of 100 dollars.(4) The class needs a minimum of 6 pupils to continue.(5) Consolidate everything to the bare minimum.(6) And when I did, I tried to keep it to a minimum.
(1) 这是完善循环的最低限度人数。(2) 最低工价为每小时四点二五美元。(3) 修理你的汽车最低限度要100美元。(4) 这个班最低限度要六个学生才可以继续办下去。(5) 把一切巩固到最低限度的最小量。(6) 吃的时候，我也要保持在最小量。

translation: n.迷你短裙
examples: (1) Miniskirts are starting to come back.(2) It's an era of the miniskirt in the seventies.
(1) 超短裙又开始流行了。(2) 七十年代是超短裙时代。

translation: n.外交使节；部长；大臣；牧师v.照顾；给予帮助
examples: (1) The president gave his minister carte blanche in foreign affairs.(2) He was elected Minister of Education.(3) The minister can only act in this matter with the sanction of Parliament.(4) The Chancellor of the Exchequer is the minister in charge of finance in Britain.(5) The minister preached a sermon on humility.(6) I have to minister to my mother all the time.(7) She felt it was her vocation to minister to the sick.
(1) 总统把处理外交事务的全权授予他的公使。(2) 他被选为教育部长。(3) 部长只有得到国会批准才能就此事采取行动。(4) 英国财政大臣是负责财政的大臣。(5) 牧师就谦恭的问题布道。(6) 我不得不一直照料我的母亲。(7) 她觉得照料病人是她的天职。

translation: n.(政府的)部；内阁；(全体)牧师
examples: (1) She's on attachment to the Ministry of Defense.(2) The army, navy and airforce are all controlled by the Ministry of Defense.(3) The Ministry released him on compassionate grounds.(4) The ministry is about to haul up the white flag.(5) Our son wants to enter the ministry.(6) He is training for the ministry.(7) He felt no vocation for the ministry.
(1) 她现在隶属于国防部。(2) 陆海空军皆由国防部控制。(3) 内阁因同情而将他释放。(4) 该内阁正准备认输。(5) 我们的儿子想做牧师。(6) 他正在接受培训，准备做牧师。(7) 他不以为做牧师是自己的天职。

translation: n.少数；少数民族；未成年
examples: (1) Only a minority of British households do not have a car.(2) A small minority voted against the motion.(3) The question of which state the minority group should belong to was decided by (a) plebiscite.(4) There are 56 minorities in our country.(5) The nationality of the minority groups in that country is still at issue.
(1) 英国只有少数家庭没有汽车。(2) 投票反对该提议的人占少数。(3) 该少数民族应归属哪一州的问题已由公民投票表决。(4) 我国有56个少数民族。(5) 在那个国家的少数民族的国籍问题上仍有争论。

translation: n.镜子；反映vt.反映；反射
examples: (1) Steam has fogged the bathroom mirror.(2) A glance in the mirror reassured him that his tie wasn't crooked.(3) She stared at herself in the mirror.(4) The clear water mirrored the blue sky.(5) These novels mirror life in today's Japan from various angles.(6) Our inventions mirror our secret wishes. ----Lawrence Durrell
(1) 水蒸气把浴室里的镜子遮住了。(2) 他照了一下镜子，领带确实没有戴歪。(3) 她凝视着镜中的自己。(4) 清澈的水中映出蔚蓝的天空。(5) 这些小说从不同角度反映了当代日本的生活。(6) 我们的发明反射出我们的秘密愿望。----劳伦斯。达雷尔

translation: mission； abbr.；=Mississippi
examples: (1) mission； abbr.；=Mississippi(3) hit or miss不定的(4) miss fire打不响(5) miss one's guess猜错(6) miss a cue未能接受暗示,未抓住...(7) miss stays抢风失败(8) a luck miss幸免于难(9) miss a figure失算(10) miss the boat错过机会(11) a near miss接近成功的失败, 功...(12) Miss Nancy[俚蔑]女人气的男人...(13) miss one's foot失脚; 踏空,走乱步...(14) miss the connection误了搭乘联运的车...(15) A miss is as good as a mile失之毫厘, 谬以千里...(16) miss the bus错过良机,事业失败...(17) miss out错过机会(18) a saucy miss毛头姑娘(19) grasp a shadow and let miss the substance抓住影子放脱实物...(20) miss plant长不出, 不发芽...(21) near miss1(25) 生词本(26) 单词管家(27) 音标说明(28) 生词本(29) 背单词(30) 海词英语(31) 桌面客户端

translation: n.导弹；投射物
examples: (1) The missile deflected from its trajectory.(2) The smallest deflection of the missile could bring disaster.(3) The missile had blown the battleship asunder.(4) A missile was projected into space.(5) The huge ship was sunk by a homing missile.(6) A defect in the fuel lines prevented the missile from blasting off.(7) Demonstrators attacked the police, using sticks and assorted missiles.(8) A hand-grenade is a missile weapon.
(1) 导弹已偏离轨道。(2) 导弹有极微小的偏斜也可能酿出大祸。(3) 炮弹把战舰炸碎了。(4) 导弹被发射升空。(5) 这只巨大的军舰被一枚自动寻的导弹击中。(6) 燃料管路上的一个缺陷妨碍了导弹的发射。(7) 示威者用棍棒和各种投掷物攻击警察。(8) 手榴弹是一种投掷武器。

translation: n.雾；迷蒙；朦胧不清vt.使…模糊；蒙上雾vi.使模糊；下雾
examples: (1) A mist of perfume hung in the air.(2) Everything was covered in mist.(3) She could hardly recognize her son through the mist of tears that filled her eyes.(4) I turn from my work and my eyes fill with the mist.(5) Our breath is misting up the car windows.(6) Humidity would mist his glasses and slick his bald head with sweat.(7) When I drink tea, my glasses mist over.
(1) 空气中飘溢著香水的雾气。(2) 一切都笼罩在雾霭中。(3) 她泪眼蒙蒙，几乎不能认出自己的儿子。(4) 我劳作回来眼神朦胧不清。(5) 我们呼出的气渐渐给汽车的窗户上蒙上一层水蒸气。(6) 湿气模糊了眼镜，汗水却令头顶更加光亮。(7) 我喝茶时眼镜蒙上了一层水汽。

translation: adj.犯错的；错误的动词mistake的过去分词.
examples: (1) I suppose you're mistaken there.(2) It appears to me that you are all mistaken.(3) He is bedeviled by his mistaken ideas.(4) If you thought she intended to be rude, you were mistaken.
(1) 我认为在这点上您错了。(2) 我觉得你们全搞错了。(3) 他被错误思想弄糊涂了。(4) 如果你认为她是故意粗鲁无礼，那你就弄错了。

translation: v.误解；误会；不了解
examples: (1) They pretend to misunderstand my complaint.(2) His remarks show that he misunderstood my position on the question.(3) He wrote her a letter for fear she misunderstand him.
(1) 他们假装误解了我的投诉。(2) 他的话说明他误解了我在这一问题上的立场。(3) 他给她写了封信，免得她误会。

translation: v.混合；掺入；合成；联系；融合；介入n.混合(物)；融合
examples: (1) You can't mix oil with water.(2) If you mix blue with yellow, you'll get green.(3) For better flavor, you can mix an egg into the batter.(4) Her son's return made her mix joy with sorrow.(5) He finds it hard to mix at parties.(6) Pink and blue mix well together.(7) Alcohol and drugs is a deadly mix.(8) Add the water and give it a good mix.
(1) 你不能把油和水混合。(2) 蓝色和黄色混合在一起就成了绿色。(3) 要想口味更好,你可以在面糊中加进一个鸡蛋。(4) 她儿子的归来令她喜悲交集。(5) 他感到很难在聚会上与人攀谈。(6) 粉色和蓝色在一起很协调。(7) 酒精和毒品混在一块儿,足以令人毙命。(8) 加点水,让它很好地融合。

translation: n.混合；混合物
examples: (1) You need a spoon to beat the mixture smooth.(2) Air is a mixture, not a compound of gases.(3) The bottom layer is a mixture of sand and clay.(4) She trickles oil into the mixture.
(1) 你需要用一把调羹来搅均混合液。(2) 空气是气体的混合物，不是化合物。(3) 最下面的一层是沙和泥的混合物。(4) 她把油一点点地注入混合物中。

translation: abbr.毫米(=millimeter)
examples: (1) The rainfall there averages 300 mm a year.
(1) 那儿的年降雨量平均每年为三百毫米。

translation: adj.移动的；易变的；活动的n.汽车；可动雕塑；悬挂饰物；活动物体
examples: (1) Additionally, consumers continue to embrace mobile personal devices.(2) He had a mobile, expressive, animated face.(3) He has a broken leg and isn't very mobile.(4) A specially equipped car makes a handicapped person more mobile.
(1) 此外,消费者接受移动个人设备的热情依然不减。(2) 他有一张多变的，富于表情的，生动活泼的脸。(3) 他的腿摔伤了,活动不便。(4) 有特殊装置的汽车使得残障者比以前更易于活动。

translation: adj.现代的；时髦的n.现代人；时尚人士
examples: (1) Modern agriculture is spoiling our beautiful countryside.(2) He can't adjust himself to the whirl of modern life in this big city.(3) Her novel depicts life in modern London.(4) She wears a modern dress.(5) Girls often shop for modern clothes.(6) This kind of furniture is modern in style.(7) Education is essential to modern men.(8) Many people live long healthy lives in modern times.
(1) 现代农业正在破坏我们美丽的农村。(2) 他无法适应这个大都市的现代生活的忙碌。(3) 她的小说描写的是伦敦现代的生活。(4) 她穿着一件时髦的礼服。(5) 女孩子们经常去商店买时髦衣服。(6) 这种家具款式时髦。(7) 教育对于现代人十分重要。(8) 很多现代人都长寿。

translation: adj.谦虚的；适度的；端庄的；有节制的
examples: (1) We should be modest and prudent.(2) She is very modest about her success.(3) I bought the house at a modest price.(4) Young girls must be modest in speech, dress and behavior.(5) She continued to lead a quiet and modest life.
(1) 我们应该谦虚谨慎。(2) 她对自己的成就很谦虚。(3) 我以适中的价格买下了这所房子。(4) 年轻姑娘必须言词谨慎，衣着得体，行为端庄。(5) 她仍然过着安静、有节制的生活。

translation: n.妈妈abbr.月中(=middle of month)abbr.会议纪要(=Minutes of Meeting)
examples: (1) I talk to my mom on the phone every Saturday.(2) My mom used to make the best peanut brittle.
(1) 我每个周六给母亲打电话。(2) 我妈妈过去经常做最好吃的花生糖。

translation: n.纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽作品
examples: (1) The monument was fronted with stone.(2) Nelson's Column is a famous monument in London.(3) The monument is in honor of a scientist.(4) Time and weather had long ago effaced the inscription on the monument.(5) A monument was built to commemorate the victory.(6) They dedicated a monument in memory of those who died in the great earthquake.(7) It's the most enigmatic prehistoric monument on earth.
(1) 纪念碑的正面是石料做的。(2) 纳尔逊纪念碑是伦敦著名的纪念碑。(3) 那座纪念碑是为纪念一位科学家而建的。(4) 岁月和风雨早已磨掉纪念碑上的铭文。(5) 为了纪念胜利，建造了一座纪念碑。(6) 他们为悼念死于大地震的人们建造纪念碑。(7) 它是地球上最神秘的史前遗迹。

translation: n.月饼
examples: (1) My mother likes moon cake with meat.(2) I eat moon cakes and pomelos on Moon Festival.
(1) 妈妈喜欢吃带有肉馅的月饼。(2) 我在中秋节时会吃月饼和柚子。

translation: n.拖把；拖把状物vt.用拖把拖；擦拭vi.用拖把拖
examples: (1) Here is a dish mop.(2) I used a mop to sop up the spilled water.(3) She had a mop of black hair.(4) I have to mop the kitchen floor at least once a day.(5) She mops her tears with a towel.(6) First she dusted, then she mopped.
(1) 这儿是洗碗刷。(2) 我用拖把把泼出的水擦干。(3) 她一头蓬乱的黑发。(4) 我每天至少要把厨房地板擦洗一次。(5) 她用毛巾擦眼泪。(6) 她首先擦掉灰尘, 然后用拖把擦。

translation: adj.道德的；精神上的n.寓意；道德；品行；伦理
examples: (1) She regards his moral faults with charity.(2) We differ about moral standards.(3) His behavior transgressed the moral rules of the social conduct.(4) The moral of this story is ‘Better late than never'.(5) People can draw a moral from tales.(6) You may draw your own moral from it.(7) As a Puritan, he is strict in moral and religion.(8) Taking drygs is also a moral and ethical problem.(9) She threw aside all her moral teachings and inhibitions.
(1) 她宽恕他的品行不端。(2) 我们对道德标准看法不一致。(3) 他的行为违背了社会行为的道德准则。(4) 这个故事的寓意是｀迟做总比不做好＇.(5) 人们可以从寓言里吸取经验教训。(6) 你可以从中得出自己的教训。(7) 作为清教徒，他的道德和宗教观念都很严格。(8) 用药问题也涉及到伦理道德问题。(9) 她把她所讲的伦理道德全抛到了一边。

translation: n.回教徒；穆罕默德信徒adj.回教徒的；回教的=Muslim（英）.
examples: (1) Yesterday when we went to the post office, we ran across a Moslem.(2) Richard the Lionhearted, leader of the Third Crusade, intends to take the fight to Moslem leader Saladin.
(1) 作天我们去邮局的时候，遇到一个回教徒。(2) 狮王李察率领十字军第三次东征，意图歼灭回教徒酋长沙拉丁。

translation: n.蚊子
examples: (1) The mosquito is the disgusting thing.(2) Mosquitoes like to suck the blood of people and animals.(3) The mosquito is a transmitter of disease.
(1) 蚊子是讨厌的东西。(2) 蚊子喜好吸人和动物的血。(3) 蚊子能传播疾病。

translation: n.祖国
examples: (1) We are loyal to our motherland.(2) He expressed earnest love to his motherland.
(1) 我们忠于祖国。(2) 他抒发了对祖国的挚爱之情。

translation: n.动机；动力；刺激；积极性
examples: (1) bend on sth(2) The most intrinsic motivation for learning is the child's spontaneous interests.(3) They lack the motivation to study.
(2) 学习的最为内在的刺激是儿童自发的兴趣。(3) 他们缺乏学习的积极性。

translation: n.马达；发动机；机动车adj.机动的；汽车的；运动神经的
examples: (1) At six o'clock the motor started up.(2) If the battery is dead, the motor won't turn over.(3) We switched off the motor and started to drift (along).(4) I stopped the car but left the motor ticking over.(5) Tell him to shut off the motor.(6) That young man is a motor mechanic.(7) All this year's new models are displayed at the motor show.(8) Last year was really bad for the motor industry in Europe.(9) The athlete has good motor coordination.
(1) 6点钟时马达开动起来。(2) 电池要是用完了，马达就转不起来了。(3) 我们关闭发动机开始滑行。(4) 我停住汽车，让发动机空转。(5) 告诉他把发动机关掉。(6) 那个年轻人是一个汽车修理工。(7) 汽车展览会上展出了今年所有的新型号。(8) 去年，欧洲的机动车市场很不景气。(9) 那个运动员运动神经的协调很好。

translation: n.摩托车v.骑摩托车
examples: (1) His parents vetoed his plan to buy a motorcycle.(2) My brother's rinky-dink motorcycle just fell apart.(3) The man on the motorcycle wore a helmet.(4) Who would want to ride a motorcycle here?
(1) 他的父母反对他买摩托车的计划。(2) 我兄弟那辆破摩托车已经解体了。(3) 骑摩托车的人戴了一顶头盔。(4) 谁会愿意在这种鬼地方骑摩托车？

translation: n.座右铭；箴言
examples: (1) Who is the subscriber of that motto?(2) Humility is the motto in his life.
(1) 谁是那条座右铭的签字者?(2) 谦卑是他的人生座右铭.

translation: adj.多山的；如山一般的
examples: (1) He lives in a mountainous district.(2) Our country is very mountainous.(3) The mountainous waves swallowed up the ship.
(1) 他住在山区。(2) 我国是一个多山的国家。(3) 山一般的巨浪吞没了那艘航船。

translation: v.哀悼；忧伤；服丧
examples: (1) People wore crapes to mourn our leader.(2) We mourn for our fallen soldiers.(3) The old woman still mourns for her son.(4) We mourn in black.
(1) 人们戴着黑纱哀悼我们的领导。(2) 我们哀悼阵亡的兵士。(3) 这位老太太还在为儿子的死伤心。(4) 我们穿黑色衣服服丧。

translation: n.小胡子；八字须=mustache（美）.
examples: (1) His lips are roofed by a moustache.(2) He had a small black moustache which was neatly trimmed.(3) His grey hair and moustache were neatly trimmed.
(1) 他的嘴唇被小胡子遮盖住了。(2) 他留着一小撮修剪整齐的黑色小胡子。(3) 他灰白的头发和八字须修剪得很整洁。

translation: n.一口；又长又拗口的词
examples: (1) I can't manage another mouthful.(2) He wants to eat it up at a mouthful.(3) He took a mouthful of sweet country air.(4) That Russian name is really a mouthful.
(1) 我一口也吃不下了。(2) 他要一口把它吃掉。(3) 他吸一口清香的乡村空气。(4) 那个俄文名字真拗口。

translation: n.活动；运动；动作；[音]乐章
examples: (1) If you did so, you would lose the movement of the knee.(2) The Trade Union Movement works to obtain higher wages and better conditions.(3) The leadership of the movement are in agreement on this issue.(4) Her every movement is very graceful.(5) He had an organized economy of movement.(6) A slow theme introduces the first movement.(7) The first movement of the symphony is beautiful.
(1) 如果你这样做,你的膝关节就不能活动了。(2) 工会运动旨在争取更高的工资和更好的工作条件。(3) 这一运动的领导层对这个问题的看法一致。(4) 她的一举一动都很优美。(5) 他的动作有条不紊，干净利落。(6) 第一乐章以缓慢的主旋律开始。(7) 这部交响乐的第一乐章是很优美的。

translation: n.电影
examples: (1) The movie was over shortly before six.(2) The movie has been hyped up far beyond its worth.
(1) 电影在六点钟不到就结束了。(2) 这部影片被吹得离了谱了。

translation: n.先生
examples: (1) This project is now under the charge of Mr White.(2) Mr.Smith launched out on an enterprise.
(1) 这项工程现在由怀特先生主管。(2) 史密斯先生精力充沛地创办一个企业。

translation: n.夫人
examples: (1) Mrs.Hyde has checked out this morning.(2) Mrs.Simpson comes in on weekdays to do for us.
(1) 海德夫人今天上午已经结帐走了。(2) 辛普森夫人周日替我们料理家务。

translation: n.女士，小姐
examples: (1) Ms Lucy, as a professional sociologist and committed feminist, is, however, not surprised. Nor is she amused.(2) Oh, hello, Ms. Richardson. I just sent you a fax.(3) I have no misgiving in recommending Ms Liu for the position you have in mind. Thank you for writing to me.(4) Ms. Brown is active in the party.
(1) 但是，作为一位职业社会学家和女权运动者，露西小姐并不觉得奇怪。她也不在乎。(2) 哦，喂，Richardson女士，我刚传真一份文件给你。(3) 我毫不犹豫地推荐刘小姐去任您将为她提供的职位。谢谢您的来信。(4) 布朗女士在晚会上很活跃。

translation: n.泥；泥浆；诽谤vt.弄脏；抹泥
examples: (1) My car's stuck in the mud, and it won't budge.(2) He removed the mud from his shoes.(3) As the bus passed, it spattered mud on my clothes.(4) The heavy wheels churned the earth into mud.(5) The boy churned the earth into mud.(6) She often threw mud at her colleagues.(7) Don't fling mud at him just because you don't like him.(8) His clothes were daubed with mud.(9) Rolling over in the mud, she would make herself all muddy and dirty.
(1) 我的车陷入泥中，一动也不动。(2) 他去掉鞋上的泥。(3) 公共汽车开过时溅了我一身泥。(4) 笨重的车轮将大地碾成了泥浆。(5) 这男孩把泥土拌成泥浆。(6) 她经常诽谤她的同事。(7) 不要因为你不喜欢他就诽谤他。(8) 他的衣服被泥浆弄脏了。(9) 然后再在泥沼中尽情的翻滚，非得把自己弄脏才停止。

translation: adj.泥泞的；浑浊的；糊涂的v.使沾上烂泥；使 ... 混浊；使迷惑
examples: (1) It's muddy underfoot.(2) The country roads were muddy and full of furrows left by farm carts.(3) The police dredged up the parcel from the muddy river.(4) There is a muddy expression in his face.(5) Don't muddy your new shoes.(6) Don't muddy the water of the stream.
(1) 地上很泥泞。(2) 乡间道路泥泞不堪，布满了牛车压出的车辙。(3) 警方从浑浊的河水中捞出包裹。(4) 他脸上有一种糊涂的表情。(5) 别把泥巴沾到新鞋子上面去。(6) 别把小溪的水弄混。

translation: n.谋杀；谋杀案；要命的事vt.谋杀；糟蹋；损坏vi.谋杀
examples: (1) He did a long stretch for attempted murder.(2) The law arrived on the scene of murder.(3) There have been several murders this year.(4) The murder trial lasted six weeks.(5) His parents and sister were all murdered by the terrorists.(6) He murdered the song by poor singing.(7) He murdered the whole work.(8) The law arrived on the scene of murder.(9) This dreadful murder is surely the act of a madman.
(1) 他因谋杀未遂罪坐了很长时间的牢。(2) 警察来到谋杀现场。(3) 今年发生了好几起谋杀案。(4) 法庭对这一谋杀案的审理为时六周。(5) 他的父母和姐姐都是被恐怖分子杀害的。(6) 他唱得很糟,糟踏了这支歌曲。(7) 他毁了全部工作。(8) 警察来到谋杀现场。(9) 这种令人惊骇的谋杀纯粹是疯子的行为。

translation: n.蘑菇；菌菇状物；暴发户vi.采蘑菇；雨后春笋般涌现；迅速增加
examples: (1) Some mushrooms are poisonous.(2) I gathered many mushrooms after rain.(3) The mushroom cloud of the A-bomb hung over the desert again.(4) Mushroom clouds appear after nuclear explosions.(5) Let's go mushrooming.(6) New blocks of flats and offices have mushroomed all over the city.
(1) 有些蘑菇有毒。(2) 雨后我采了很多蘑菇。(3) 原子弹爆炸的蘑菇云再度笼罩在沙漠的上空。(4) 核弹爆炸后会产生蘑菇云。(5) 我们采蘑菇去吧。(6) 在全市各处如雨后春笋般出现了许多新公寓和办公楼。

translation: adj.音乐的；喜欢音乐的；悦耳的n.音乐片
examples: (1) The mother found that her son had a musical talent.(2) Since he can play many musical instruments, he may well be called a man of accomplishments.(3) Everyone in my family is very musical.(4) A musical bell softly sounded somewhere in the passageway.(5) Carroll appeared in a number of Broadway musicals.
(1) 母亲发现儿子有音乐天赋。(2) 他能演奏许多乐器，当然称得上是个多才多艺的人。(3) 我家所有人都很喜欢音乐。(4) 走廊的某处响起轻柔悦耳的铃声。(5) 卡洛尔演出了一系列百老汇音乐剧。

translation: n.音乐家
examples: (1) That musician is very famous.(2) He's not in the first grade as a musician.(3) The musician made the legend into a beautiful ballad.(4) She is a talented musician as well as being a photographer.(5) The musician gave full tribute to his former teacher.

translation: n. 妈妈；木乃伊；干瘪的人
examples: There will be an Egyptian mummy show in that country.Since then, organic materials ranging from Egyptian mummy hair to Stone Age sandals have been dated.Mummy and Daddy will be back soon.I got lots of things from Mummy.
那个国家将要展示埃及木乃伊。自那时起，从埃及的木乃伊头发到石器时代的檀香木等有机物质的年代都已被确定。妈妈爸爸就要回来了。我从妈妈那里得到许多的东西。

translation: n. 星期一
examples: He'll arrive on Monday.Next Monday will be my 21st birthday.The store took stock on Monday.The ship will start its maiden voyage next Monday.We shall have meetings on two consecutive days, Monday and Tuesday.
他将于星期一到达。下星期一是我二十一岁的生日。那家商店每逢星期一进行盘点。这艘船将于下周一开始它的处女航。周一周二连续两天我们都将开会。

translation: n. 钱；货币；财富n. (Money)人名；(英)莫尼；(西、法)莫内
examples: He robs her of money.Time is money.Money doesn't always bring happiness.She accepted the money with mingled feelings.It is a crime to counterfeit money.
他抢夺她的财产。时间就是金钱。金钱并不一定带来快乐。她悲喜交集地收下了这笔钱。伪造货币是犯罪行为。

translation: n. 监视器；监听器；监控器；显示屏；班长vt. 监控
examples: Police officers have been closely monitoring the organization's activities.He will monitor and review the company's rules and regulations.This instrument monitors the patient's heartbeats.The monitor handed the papers out to the classmates.Monitors have been introduced in the exams.He worked as a monitor during the civil war and had obtained a lot of secret information from the enemy.I need to buy a new computer monitor.This kind of monitor releases low radiation.
警方密切地监视着该组织的活动。他将监督并审查该公司的规章制度。这台仪器监听病人的心跳。班长把试卷分发给同学们。监视器已被用于考试中。他内战时是一名监听员,获取了许多敌人的机密情报。我需要新买一台电脑显示器。这种显示器释放低辐射线。

translation: n. 猴子；顽童vi. 胡闹；捣蛋vt. 嘲弄
examples: When the tree falls, the monkeys scatter.He's as mischievous as a monkey!It is dangerous to monkey around in the workshop.Don't monkey about with this computer.He likes to monkey with old clocks and engines.I have a pet monkey which attempts to mock all my actions.
树倒猢狲散。他像猴子那麽顽皮！在车间里胡闹是危险的。不要乱动这台计算机。他喜欢摆弄旧钟和引擎。我养了一只猴子当宠物，它试图模仿我所有的动作。

translation: n. 月，一个月的时间
examples: He shut himself away for a month to catch up on his academic work.He's asking 80 a month rent for that flat.July is the hottest month in a year in my hometown.His baby is six months old.Profits have reached a new low this month.We're going on holiday next month.
他与世隔绝一个月，力图把功课赶上去。那套房间月租他要80英镑。在我的家乡，七月是一年里最热的一月。他的孩子有六个月大了。这个月利润下降到新的低点。我们准备下月去度假.

translation: n. 月亮；月球；月光；卫星vi. 闲荡；出神vt. 虚度n. (Moon)人名；(瑞典)莫恩；(柬)蒙；(英)穆恩；(缅)孟
examples: The moon goes round the earth.Last night there was a full moon.The moon peeped out from behind the clouds.The spacecraft is in orbit around the moon.The boys have nothing to do but moon around in the streets .Are you going to moon away the whole of your life ?I don't like to moon away this Sunday in idleness.All that she has done since her boy - friend left her is to moon about .
月亮绕着地球转。昨晚是满月。月亮从云层中隐现。该航天器在绕月球轨道运行。这些男孩子没什么事可做，只是在街上闲荡。你就准备虚度整个人生的时光吗?我不愿意无所事事地度过这个星期天。她男朋友离开她后，她所做的一切就是闲荡。

translation: adv. 更多；此外；更大程度地adj. 更多的；附加的pron. 更多的数量n. 更多n. (More)人名；(英、法)莫尔；(意、西、以)莫雷
examples: There are more cars on the road in the summer than in the winter.We need two more pairs of bath slippers.They are proud of taking more power.As a freelancer, he has more free time to himself.I'm a person of haste.I need to be more patient.He's dirty, and what's more he smells.I am becoming more and more irritated by his selfish behaviour.
夏天路上的车子比冬天多。我们另外再要两双洗澡用拖鞋。他们以掌握更大的权力为荣。因为是个自由职业者,他有更多属于自己的自由时间。我是个急性子的人,我需要再多点耐心。他很脏,而且身上还有味呢。我对他那种自私的行为愈加恼火起来。

translation: n. 早晨；黎明；初期
examples: Did you really feel ill this morning?He is loath to get out of bed on cold morning.The people next door play their radio from morning till night.I'll ring her up in the morning.
今天早晨你真的感到身体不适吗？在寒冷的早晨他讨厌起床。邻居从早到晚开着收音机。我明天上午给她打电话。

translation: n. 蚊子
examples: The mosquito is the disgusting thing.Mosquitoes like to suck the blood of people and animals.The mosquito is a transmitter of disease.
蚊子是讨厌的东西。蚊子喜好吸人和动物的血。蚊子能传播疾病。

translation: adv. 最；非常，极其；最多；几乎adj. 大部分的，多数的；最多的n. 大部分，大多数n. (Most)人名；(德、俄、法、芬、捷、英)莫斯特
examples: This is the area that attracts the most attention.Studying on our own brings the most knowledge.Who do you think will get (the) most votes?Most students passed the examination.Rice is the chief crop in most southern provinces.What did you most enjoy?The person who gave most generously to the scheme has been blind from birth.It was the most exciting holiday I've ever had.She helped me (the) most when my parents died.We heard a most interesting talk about Japan.I received a most unusual present from my aunt.Most of the town was destroyed.Most of the books were missing.
这是最受关注的地区。自己钻研可带来最多的知识。你认为谁会得到最多的选票?大多数学生通过了考试。稻子是大多数南方省份的主要作物。你最欣赏的是什麽?赞助这一项目最慷慨的是个先天盲人。那是我经历过的最使人兴奋的假日.我父母死时她给我的帮助最多。我们听了一个关于日本的非常有趣的谈话。我收到姨母给我的一件极不寻常的礼物。小镇的大部分地区被破坏了。大部分书都找不着了。

translation: n. 母亲；大娘；女修道院院长vt. 生下；养育；像母亲般关怀或照管adj. 母亲的；出生地的
examples: I wonder when mother will ring?It happened that my mother was out that day.He disobeyed his mother and went to the party.My mother is a housewife.The mother bade the child behave himself.Mother love is the greatest in the world.My sister mothered a little baby two days ago.He likes to mother the toddlers.Mrs.Green mothered the lost children.
我不知道母亲什么时候会打电话来？我母亲恰巧那天出去了。他不听母亲的劝告，参加了那次聚会。我妈妈是个家庭妇女。妈妈叮咛孩子要守规矩。世界上母爱是最伟大的。两天前我姐姐生了个孩子。他喜欢像母亲般照管学步的小孩。格林太太慈母般照料那几个走失的孩子。

translation: n. 摩托车
examples: That motorbike will be the death of you.
那辆摩托车就会要了你的命。

translation: n. 山；山脉n. (Mountain)人名；(英)芒廷
examples: I have a mountain of work to do.The mountain is 3500 meters high.The mountain tops are covered with snow.This mountain runs from east to west.Plains, plateaus, and mountain ranges are major landforms.He nearly died of exposure on the cold mountain.
我有一大堆工作要做。这座山有3500米高。白雪覆盖着山顶。这是一座东西走向的山脉。平原、高原和山脉都是主要的地形。他在寒冷的高山上差一点没有冻死。

translation: n. 鼠标；老鼠；胆小羞怯的人vt. 探出vi. 捕鼠；窥探
examples: The mouse scurried into its hole when the cat appeared.The cat is playing with a live mouse.He remained a mouse in public affairs.My mouse is broken, so I need to get a new one.Does your cat mouse well?The burglar moused about for valuables.Mouse over the link in the original message.
猫一露面，老鼠急忙钻进自己的洞里。猫在戏弄那只活老鼠。在公众事务上他依然胆小如鼠。我的鼠标坏了，得去买个新的。你家的猫很会抓老鼠吗?窃贼鬼鬼祟祟地四处搜寻值钱之物。移动鼠标至原始信息的链接上。

translation: n. 口，嘴；河口vt. 做作地说，装腔作势地说；喃喃地说出vi. 装腔作势说话
examples: Her mouth is her best feature.The dying animal was found foaming at the mouth.Seeing that we are confused about her attitude, she had to give mouth to her doubts.The sand has silted up the mouth of the river.The nurse mouthed the word "quiet".I dislike lecturers who mouth their speeches.He crept into the corner, mouthing curses.
她的嘴是她容貌上最好看的部分。那只将死的动物被发现口吐白沫。看到我们对她的态度表示不解,她只得说出心里的疑惑。泥沙已把河口堵住了。护士以口形默示“安静”。我不喜欢夸夸其谈的演讲者。他悄悄地移到角落，嘴里喃喃地诅咒着。

translation: n. 移动；步骤；迁居；策略vi. 移动；搬家，迁移；离开vt. 移动；感动
examples: The army is on the move.This move is now in preparation.Their move to Latin America was a leap in the dark.Evans is a rare dancer, whose moves are so elegant.Give me a place to stand and I will move the world.That desk is fixed, don't try to move it.The woman is deeply moved by his selfless spirit.Give it a hard push, then it will move.My family moved here two years ago.Nobody seems willing to move in the matter.
军队在移动。这一步骤，目前正在准备中。他们迁居拉丁美洲是件冒险的事。伊万是个杰出的舞者，他的动作非常优美。给我一个支点，我会推动地球。那张桌子是固定的，别去移动它。妇女被他的无私精神深深感动了。用力推一下，就能使它移动。我们全家两年前搬到这儿。似乎没有人愿意对这件事采取行动。

translation: adv. 非常，很adj. 大量的n. 许多，大量pron. 许多，大量n. (Much)人名；(德)穆赫；(英)马奇
examples: The President's speech provoked much discussion.All the furniture in the room had much carving.My plans are still very much in embryo.I would very much like to see you again.They looked forward very much to seeing him again.I like this coffeepot very much.The patient is much the same this morning.Much has been written.I think we may learn much from it.
总统的演说引发了许多议论。房间里所有的家具上都有许多雕刻。我的计划在很大程度上仍在酝酿中。我很想再见到你。他们非常盼望再次见到他。我非常喜欢这个咖啡壶。今晨病人情况几无变化。大量内容已被写过了我想我们能从中学到许多。

translation: vt. 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘vi. 乘；繁殖；增加adv. 多样地；复合地adj. 多层的；多样的
examples: If you multiply four by five, the answer is twenty.Let us multiply the height by the width to determine the area.This will multiply our chances of success.He managed to multiply his profits.We have to multiply our efforts.He learned to multiply at the age of five.The little boy can add, subtract and multiply, but cannot divide.Rabbits multiply quickly.Cells multiply by means of cell division.
四乘以五,答案是二十。用宽乘以高来确定面积。这将增加我们成功的机会。他成功地增加了利润。我们得更加努力。他五岁学会做乘法。那小男孩会做加法、减法和乘法，但不会做除法。兔子繁殖很快。细胞通过细胞分裂的方式来繁殖。

translation: n. 博物馆
examples: The museum has many immemorial cultural relics.The museum displays the specimen of ancient Chinese porcelain.Flashes are not allowed to be used in this museum.We found a Picasso in the museum.Every year the museum organizes 10 temporary exhibitions.
该博物馆收藏了很多极其古老的文物。这个博物馆展出中国古瓷器标本。这个博物馆里不准使用闪光灯。我们在展览馆发现了一张毕加索画的画。这个展览馆每年举行十次短期展览。

translation: n. 音乐，乐曲
examples: He is interested in music.Listening to the music has a calming influence on her.I was enchanted with the sweet music.He listened with pleasure to the beautiful music.The beautiful music is still lingering in my ears.I can't play because I have lost my music.She was able to read music from early childhood.
他对音乐有兴趣。听音乐对她起了一种镇静的作用。这美妙的音乐使我心醉。他陶醉在美妙的音乐中。美妙的音乐依然在我耳际萦绕。我不能演奏了，因为我把乐谱丢了。她从很小的时候就能识乐谱。

translation: aux. 必须，一定；可以，应当；很可能n. 绝对必要的事物；未发酵葡萄汁n. (Must)人名；(匈)穆什特；(俄、瑞典)穆斯特
examples: Something must be done about it.In England traffic must keep to the left.We must make allowance for his youth.One must honor his contract and keep his word.The dictionary must be on the bookshelf in my bedroom.A raincoat is a must in the rainy season.His new novel is a must for all lovers of crime fiction.
必须得想个办法。在英国，车辆必须靠左行驶。我们应当考虑到他还年轻。任何人都应当尊重合同，信守诺言。词典很可能丢在卧室的书架上。在雨季雨衣是必备之物。他的新小说是罪案小说爱好者必须一读的。

translation: pron. 我的int. 哎呀（表示惊奇等）；喔唷n. (My)人名；(越)美；(老、柬)米
examples: My phone was out of order.You mistook my meaning entirely.My friend invited me to dine out.My! Just look at all those beautiful cakes!My, oh, my, what a busy day!
我的电话坏了。你完全误解了我的意思。我的朋友邀请我出去吃饭。哎呦！过来看看那些所有的好看的蛋糕！哎呀,哦,真是忙碌的一天呀！

translation: pron. 我自己；我亲自；我的正常的健康状况和正常情绪
examples: I started to enjoy this kind of music myself.
我自己也喜欢上这类音乐。

translation: 做鬼脸
examples: The teacher told him not to make faces in class.Then he made faces and jumped like a monkey.
老师告诉他不要在上课时做鬼脸。接着他做鬼脸并象猴子一样地跳。

translation: 与…交友
examples: He's mixing with the wrong people.This boy has a faculty of making friends easily.Make friends with expert bloggers in your niche.She has a knack of making friends.They dwell at unity with the natives.He lives in amity with his neighbours.
他交友不慎。这个男孩有交友的能力。在你的领域与专家交朋友。她有一套交朋友的诀窍。他们与当地人和睦地住在一起。他和他的邻居相处得很和睦。

translation: 组成；补足；化妆；编造
examples: I tried to make up for my loss.Let's make up.The boy made up a story, it is not true.Leave this notice hanging on your door, asking the servant to make up your room.I don't like to see women making up in public.Farm workers make up only a small section of the population.
我力图补偿我的损失。让我们言归于好吧。这个故事不是真的,是那个男孩编造出来的。留张便条挂在你房门上, 请服务员把你的房间整理一下。我不喜欢看见女人在公开场合化妆打扮。农民只占人口的一小部分。

translation: 构成；由……组成
examples: The group was made up of doctors.No matter what substance it may be, it is made up of atom.So Della did. You see, life You see, life is made up of sobs, sniffles, and smiles- but mainly of sniffles.Life is made up of little things.
这个团体是由医生组成的。不管这是什么物质，都由原子构成。德拉就这样做了。你知道，人生是由呜咽，抽泣和徽笑组成的，而其中主要的是抽泣。[谚]人生是由琐碎的事物构成的。

translation: 成千上万的...；无数的...
examples: Millions of people gave freely in response to the famine appeal.During the depression, millions of the unemployed wandered around in the streets.There are millions of living things on the earth.In the Patent Office, we still have millions of ideas that are free for use.There may be millions of worlds in the Milky Way Galaxy.Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.There were millions of people in the square.Millions of cattle are slaughtered every day.
千百万人响应救灾呼吁而慷慨解囊。经济萧条时期，有好几百万的失业者在街头游荡。世界上有数以百万计的生物。在专利局，我们还有许多的想法没有付诸实施。银河系中也许有几百万个世界。恐龙已绝种几百万年了。广场上有好多好多人。每天有数百万头牛被屠杀。

translation: 或多或少
examples: We found each cask leak more or less.He more or less thought it was his duty to tell me.
我们发现每桶都有或多或少的流漏现象。他或多或少认为自己有义务告诉我。
